${ModID}:Polishing.NAME: Polishing
${ModID}:Polishing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, increase its damage by !M! this combat.

${ModID}:WorkHammer.NAME: Work Hammer
${ModID}:WorkHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${ModID}:Front damage. NL Give enemy !M! Plated Armor.

${ModID}:Chained.NAME: Chained
${ModID}:Chained.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Give ALL enemies !M! Block.

${ModID}:Rapier.NAME: Rapier
${ModID}:Rapier.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! ${ModID}:Front damage. NL Goes through Block.

${ModID}:Fall.NAME: Fall
${ModID}:Fall.DESCRIPTION: Deal ${ModID}:Front damage equal to the number of cards in your NL draw pile + 6.
${ModID}:Fall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal ${ModID}:Front damage equal to the number of cards in your NL draw pile + 6.

${ModID}:Turtle.NAME: Turtle
${ModID}:Turtle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next Attack deals ${ModID}:Feral damage.

${ModID}:Bolas.NAME: Bolas
${ModID}:Bolas.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Apply anniv5:Slow. NL Give enemy !M! Block. NL Draw !anniv5:m2! card{!anniv5:m2!|1=|@=s}. NL Exhaust.
